pullrequest.title: Added ability to restore UI state

content.raw: With runmanager I chose to put it with shot storage along with the lab connection table - the idea being that they're both part of the configuration for running the experiment. So this is just copying that I think. It's BLACS keeping its settings in labconfig that I would prefer to change, personally.
content.html: With runmanager I chose to put it with shot storage along with the lab connection table - the idea being that they're both part of the configuration for running the experiment. So this is just copying that I think. It's BLACS keeping its settings in labconfig that I would prefer to change, personally.
